title: Cuban Coffee & Cigars With Colin Ganley From Twin Engine Coffee
itunes:title: Cuban Coffee & Cigars With Colin Ganley From Twin Engine Coffee
description:
We are joined by Colin Ganley who calls in to The Cigar Authority from Nicaragua and we will talk Twin Engine Coffee. We will drink Cuban Coffee from the company and light up a Montecristo 80 Aniversario from the 2017 Habano Fesitival.

Inter-tabac is under way in Germany and we have the winners of the Cigar Trophy Awards as shared to us by our friends at Cigar Journal magazine.

In the second hour we pair a Perdomo Habano Sun Grown that was part of The Cigar Authority care package with Twin Engine Nicaraguan coffee.

All that and the usual bag of tricks Debonaire Mr. J, Asylum Barry, Cigar News, Classic 3 Way and even a few mail bags..

The Cigar Authority is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
